name: Fractured (TriTorus)
description:
A small roguelike I am working on. It will eventually have many more items with many more features over time and over many updates, and I think it's finally in a playable state (even though it only has 3 items LOL)

You move with WASD, shoot with left click, throw a grenade with 1.

When you hear a DING, move in the direction of the ding to get to the portal and go to the next level.

The game increases in difficulty exponentially so make sure you grab the items that drop from the enemies you massacre.
